text: Po miloserdiyu Boga, ty krotok s nimi; a yesli by ty byl surov i zhestok serdtsem, to oni, verno, udalilis' by ot tebya. Potomu, prosti im i isprosi u Boga proshcheniye im. Sovetuysya s nimi o delakh, i kogda reshish'sya na chto, vozlozhi nadezhdu na Boga, potomu, chto Bog lyubit nadeyushchikhsya na Nego
